com.twitter.sdk.android.core

Class TwitterCore

  • Object
    • io.fabric.sdk.android.Kit<Boolean>
      • com.twitter.sdk.android.core.TwitterCore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<io.fabric.sdk.android.Kit>

    public class TwitterCore
extends io.fabric.sdk.android.Kit<Boolean>
    The TwitterCore Kit provides Login with Twitter and the Twitter API.

        public void logIn(Activity activity,
         Callback<TwitterSession> callback)
        Performs log in on behalf of a user.
        Parameters:
        activity - The Activity context to use for the login flow.
        callback - The callback interface to invoke when login completes.

      • logOut

        public void logOut()
        Logs out the user, clearing user session. This will not make a network request to invalidate the session.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if Fabric or TwitterCore has not been initialized.

      • getApiClient

        public TwitterApiClient getApiClient()
        Creates TwitterApiClient from default Session retrieved from SessionManager. Caches internally for efficient access.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if Fabric or TwitterCore has not been initialized.

      • getApiClient

        public TwitterApiClient getApiClient(Session session)
        Creates TwitterApiClient from authenticated Session provided. Caches internally for efficient access.
        Parameters:
        session - the session
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if Fabric or TwitterCore has not been initialized.
